text.line: Your boss is furious. He wants those God-damn glue-sniffing Occupy hippies out of Wall Street and if they could keep outside a five hundred metre radius of his Mercedes that would be great.
He hands you a sheet of paper with the words "EVICTION NOTICE" printed in big, angry red letters.
He demands that you deliver the message to the unwashed socialist filth accruing in the park immediately, and shoos you from his office.
